net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_RollExpression_setDisadvantage
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Indicates if the provided RollExpression has disadvantage. If the RollExpression is not already an expression with an explicit or inferred type of "advatangable", the type will be added.
arg (0) = RollExpression arg (1) = 0: does not have Disadvantage; 1: does have Disadvantage
Returns RollExpression
